attributes.action: ensure that the necessary action is taken to enable the changes recommended on MP expenses to be implemented at the date of the next election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I belive it is important that the changes to MP expenses are implemented at the time of the next election in order to put this item "to bed" and stop it becoming a discussion for ever and a day.If the changes are not sorted out quickly it will be seen as another thing left in the hope it will go away . Believe me it will not go away.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
